{"step_by_step_thinking": "The study is retrospective and relies on mothers' memory of their prenatal consumption of folic acid. This could lead to recall bias, as mothers with children diagnosed with ASD might remember their prenatal habits differently than mothers with healthy children. Interviewer bias is less likely because the questionnaires were standardized. Latency period and survival bias are not relevant in this context.", "answer_choice": "C. Recall bias"}
